item.description:
It's the third Thursday of the month so we are going to finish up 2012 with a Trivia Game night.  However, this one won't be STUMP.  Instead, we'll be playing home-style board games such as:

  • Wits and Wagers
  • You Don't Know Jack
  • Trivial Pursuit
  • Outburst
  • Balderdash
  • and any other trivia like game you have

I'm going to use the money we earned from winning STUMP Trivia contests to order a bunch of takeout food for the group (previous players will have first dibs at signing up).

So come on down and end the year with a bang.  Hope to see you there! :-)

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Trivia Games in Danvers
